cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Oversight and Reform on June 14, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 7899, a bill to designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 75 Commerce Drive in Grayslake, Illinois, as the “Army Specialist Joseph ‘Joey’ W. Dimock II Post Office Building

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 93 (Friday, May 27, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. SCHNEIDER:
H.R. 7899.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I
[Page H5221]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 75 Commerce Drive in Grayslake, Illinois, as the "Army Specialist Joseph 'Joey' W. Dimock II Post Office Building".
